net.toxbank.client.resource
Class InvestigationClient

java.lang.Object
  net.toxbank.client.resource.InvestigationClient

public class InvestigationClient
extends Object

A client for accessing investigation resources. This does not inherit from AbstractClient as the investigation service operates significantly different from the other services.

querySparql

public com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model querySparql(String sparqlQuery,
                                                   URL rootUrl)
                                            throws Exception
Runs the given sparql query, which is assumed to have a subject variable ?s, a predicate variable ?p and an object variable ?o. The results are then loaded into a newly created model and returned

Parameters:
sparqlQuery - a query containing variables s, p, and o
rootUrl - the root url where the query should be performed
Returns:
a new model populated with the results of the query
Throws:
Exception

querySparqlIntoModel

public void querySparqlIntoModel(String sparqlQuery,
                                 URL rootUrl,
                                 com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model model)
                          throws Exception
Runs the given sparql query, which is assumed to have a subject variable ?s, a predicate variable ?p and an object variable ?o. The results are then loaded into the provided model

Parameters:
sparqlQuery - a query containing variables s, p, and o
rootUrl - the root url where the query should be performed
model - the model to populated with the results of the query
Throws:
Exception
